name: Bulbasaur
flavorText: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.flavorText: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.
This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

1.name: Tackle
1.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Growl
1.flavorText: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.
1.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

1.name: Leech Seed
1.flavorText: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.
1.effect: Seeds the target, stealing HP from it every turn.

1.name: Vine Whip
1.flavorText: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

1.name: Sleep Powder
1.flavorText: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.
1.effect: Puts the target to sleep.

1.name: Poison Powder
1.flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.
1.effect: Poisons the target.

1.name: Take Down
1.flavorText: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
1.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

1.name: Razor Leaf
1.flavorText: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
1.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

1.name: Sweet Scent
1.effect: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.

1.name: Growth
1.flavorText: The user’s body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
1.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.

1.name: Double-Edge
1.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
1.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

1.name: Worry Seed
1.effect: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.

1.name: Synthesis
1.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.

1.name: Seed Bomb
1.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

2.name: Petal Dance
2.flavorText: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
2.effect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

2.name: Grassy Terrain
2.effect: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.

2.name: Skull Bash
2.flavorText: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
2.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

2.name: Amnesia
2.flavorText: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
2.effect: Raises the user's Special Defense by two stages.

2.name: Curse
2.flavorText: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.
2.effect: Ghosts pay half their max HP to hurt the target every turn.  Others decrease Speed but raise Attack and Defense.

2.name: Giga Drain
2.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
2.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

2.name: Endure
2.flavorText: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
2.effect: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

2.name: Sludge
2.flavorText: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
2.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

2.name: Nature Power
2.effect: Uses a move which depends upon the terrain.

2.name: Ingrain
2.effect: Prevents the user from leaving battle.  User regains 1/16 of its max HP every turn.

2.name: Grass Whistle
2.effect: Puts the target to sleep.

2.name: Magical Leaf
2.effect: Never misses.

2.name: Leaf Storm
2.effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

2.name: Power Whip
2.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

2.name: Charm
2.flavorText: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its Attack stat.
2.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

3.name: Grass Pledge
3.effect: With Fire Pledgefire-pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.

4.name: Swords Dance
4.flavorText: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.
4.effect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages.

4.name: Confide
4.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

4.name: Toxic
4.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
4.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

4.name: Double Team
4.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
4.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

4.name: Light Screen
4.flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.
4.effect: Reduces damage from special attacks by 50% for five turns.

4.name: Rest
4.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
4.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

4.name: Substitute
4.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
4.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

4.name: Protect
4.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
4.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

4.name: Sludge Bomb
4.flavorText: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
4.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

4.name: Swagger
4.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
4.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

4.name: Attract
4.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
4.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

4.name: Sleep Talk
4.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
4.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

4.name: Return
4.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

4.name: Solar Beam
4.flavorText: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
4.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

4.name: Safeguard
4.effect: Protects the user's field from major status ailments and confusion for five turns.

4.name: Hidden Power
4.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

4.name: Sunny Day
4.effect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

4.name: Facade
4.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

4.name: Nature Power
4.effect: Uses a move which depends upon the terrain.

4.name: Energy Ball
4.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

4.name: Grass Knot
4.effect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.

4.name: Venoshock
4.effect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

4.name: Round
4.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

4.name: Echoed Voice
4.effect: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

4.name: Work Up
4.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

4.name: Frustration
4.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

name: Ivysaur
flavorText: There is a bud on this Pokémon’s back. To support its weight, Ivysaur’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.

name: Venusaur
flavorText: There is a large flower on Venusaur’s back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.

name: Charmander
flavorText: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is enjoying itself. If the Pokémon becomes enraged, the flame burns fiercely.

2.name: Outrage

2.effect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

2.name: Metal Claw
2.effect: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by one stage.

2.name: Crunch
2.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

2.name: Ancient Power
2.effect: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage.

2.name: Counter
2.flavorText: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
2.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

2.name: Focus Punch
2.effect: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.

2.name: Air Cutter
2.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

2.name: Dragon Dance
2.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage.

2.name: Flare Blitz
2.effect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

2.name: Dragon Pulse
2.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

2.name: Beat Up
2.effect: Hits once for every conscious Pokémon the trainer has.

3.name: Fire Pledge
3.effect: With Water Pledgewater-pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon's moves for four turns.

4.name: Swords Dance
4.flavorText: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.
4.effect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages.

4.name: Confide
4.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

4.name: Toxic
4.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
4.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

4.name: Double Team
4.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
4.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

4.name: Fire Blast
4.flavorText: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
4.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

4.name: Rest
4.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
4.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

4.name: Rock Slide
4.flavorText: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
4.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

4.name: Substitute
4.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
4.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

4.name: Protect
4.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
4.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

4.name: Swagger
4.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
4.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

4.name: Attract
4.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
4.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

4.name: Sleep Talk
4.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
4.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

4.name: Return
4.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

4.name: Frustration
4.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

4.name: Hidden Power
4.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

4.name: Flamethrower
4.flavorText: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
4.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

4.name: Will-O-Wisp
4.effect: Burns the target.

4.name: Facade
4.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

4.name: Brick Break
4.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

4.name: Overheat
4.effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

4.name: Rock Tomb
4.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

4.name: Aerial Ace
4.effect: Never misses.

4.name: Dragon Claw
4.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

4.name: Fling
4.effect: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.

4.name: Shadow Claw
4.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

4.name: Flame Charge
4.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.

4.name: Round
4.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

4.name: Echoed Voice
4.effect: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

4.name: Work Up
4.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

4.name: Sunny Day
4.effect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

name: Charmeleon
flavorText: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.flavorText: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP decreases every turn.
abilities.shortEffect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.
effect: During strong sunlight, this Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack but takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn.

4.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

4.name: Double Team
4.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
4.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

4.name: Waterfall
4.flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
4.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

4.name: Rest
4.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
4.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

4.name: Substitute
4.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
4.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

4.name: Protect
4.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
4.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

4.name: Swagger
4.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
4.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

4.name: Attract
4.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
4.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

4.name: Sleep Talk
4.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
4.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

4.name: Return
4.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

4.name: Ice Beam
4.flavorText: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
4.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

4.name: Hidden Power
4.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

4.name: Rain Dance
4.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

4.name: Hail
4.effect: Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns.

4.name: Facade
4.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

4.name: Brick Break
4.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

4.name: Rock Tomb
4.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

4.name: Gyro Ball
4.effect: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.

4.name: Fling
4.effect: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.

4.name: Round
4.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

4.name: Scald
4.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

4.name: Work Up
4.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

4.name: Frustration
4.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

name: Wartortle
flavorText: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon’s toughness as a battler.
